DataElement.preferredName: COVID-19 Vaccine Second Dose Administered Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The month, day, and year the second dose of COVID-19 vaccine was administered.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any vaccine that may prevent or treat coronavirus disease-2019 (COVID-19) that is caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2)._Coming next after the first in position in space or time or degree or magnitude._A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any vaccine that may prevent or treat coronavirus disease-2019 (COVID-19) that is caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).:Coming next after the first in position in space or time or degree or magnitude.:A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.

Concepts.definition: Any vaccine that may prevent coronavirus disease-2019 (COVID-19) that is caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
Coming next after the first in position in space or time or degree or magnitude.
A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Active immunization where vaccine is administered for therapeutic or preventive purposes. This can include administration of immunopotentiating agents such as BCG vaccine and Corynebacterium parvum as well as biological response modifiers such as interferons, interleukins, and colony-stimulating factors in order to directly stimulate the immune system.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 04/06/2021 created for COVID and PD SVAR_ti

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
